comment: лор ксенос - на стелу с письменами

languages.text: Рябь неровной волной пробегает по поверхности стелы. Начертанные на ней символы подрагивают и сбиваются в кучу, не задерживаясь в вашей памяти ни на секунду.

traits.locale_text: Рябь неровной волной пробегает на поверхности стелы. Подрагивая, начертанные на ней отдельные символы складываются в длинные, бесконечные строки незнакомых фигур, и отзываются в вас тягучим головокружением.

languages.text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.
languages.original_text: Рябь неровной волной пробегает по поверхности стелы. Начертанные на ней символы подрагивают и сбиваются в кучу, не задерживаясь в вашей памяти ни на секунду.

traits.locale_text: A ripple runs across the stele in an uneven wave. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for more than a second.
A ripple runs across the stele in an uneven wave. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for more than a second.
An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.
An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.
An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.
An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

languages.text: Una ondulación desigual recorre la superficie de la estela. Los símbolos que la cubren tiemblan y se mezclan entre ellos. No logras recordar ni uno durante más de un segundo.
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

traits.locale_text: Una ondulación desigual recorre la superficie de la estela. Los símbolos que la cubren tiemblan y se mezclan entre ellos. No logras recordar ni uno durante más de un segundo.

languages.text: Une vague irrégulière parcourt la surface de la stèle. Les symboles qui la recouvrent tressaillent et se mélangent. Vous n'en gardez aucun en mémoire plus d'une seconde.
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

traits.locale_text: Une vague irrégulière parcourt la surface de la stèle. Les symboles qui la recouvrent tressaillent et se mélangent. Vous n'en gardez aucun en mémoire plus d'une seconde.

languages.text: 碑の表面に不均等な波紋が走る。それを覆うシンボルは震え、お互いに混ざりあう。そのすべてが一秒もたたないうちに記憶から消えてしまった。
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

traits.locale_text: 碑の表面に不均等な波紋が走る。それを覆うシンボルは震え、お互いに混ざりあう。そのすべてが一秒もたたないうちに記憶から消えてしまった。

languages.text: 石碑表面泛起了不均匀的涟漪。覆盖在石碑上的符号不断颤抖，相互融合，没有任何符号能在你的脑海中停留一秒。
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

traits.locale_text: 石碑表面泛起了不均匀的涟漪。覆盖在石碑上的符号不断颤抖，相互融合，没有任何符号能在你的脑海中停留一秒。

languages.text: Ein ungleichmäßiges Kräuseln bewegt sich über die Oberfläche der Stele. Die Symbole, mit denen sie bedeckt ist, erzittern und verschmelzen miteinander. Keines bleibt länger als eine Sekunde lang in deinem Gedächtnis.
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.

traits.locale_text: Ein ungleichmäßiges Kräuseln bewegt sich über die Oberfläche der Stele. Die Symbole, mit denen sie bedeckt ist, erzittern und verschmelzen miteinander. Keines bleibt länger als eine Sekunde lang in deinem Gedächtnis.

languages.text: Stelin yüzeyinde düzensiz bir dalgalanma meydana geliyor. Üzerindeki semboller, titreşip birbirinin içine geçiyor. Hiçbiri hafızanda bir saniyeden uzun kalmıyor.
languages.original_text: An uneven ripple runs across the stele's surface. The symbols covering it tremble and blend into each other. None stay in your memory for longer than a second.
